* Iron lifted a brow at Whistler's explinations before turning back to the 
dimly lit hall ahead and proceeding on her way, finding that she couldn't 
help but smile at his last comment.*

" Well, it's kinda hard to see who's jumping infront of you and trying to be 
a hero when you've got missiles coming in every which way but loose."

** Her shoulder shrugged.*

" BUT I'll make sure to keep an eye on you...as long as you don't mind that 
it'll be detached from a smoldering, quivering pile of charred slag.You 
know."

* Looking back at Whistler through the strands of white hair which fell from 
the crown of her head and over the curve of her shoulder she smiled and 
winked before looking ahead once more.
Soon she would call upon the Maximals, perticularly that mole bot. She had 
an idea that needed doing.*
